name: L50 Connect-A-Bots
description:
Visit the Silly Sentence Factory and help Period-Bot connect other robots together to build super silly and funny sentences. You'll have robots laughing until their circuit boards hurt! Children will reinforce their understanding of sentence structure through organizing words into simple sentences, including subjects, verbs, and objects as well as add in adjectives and adverbs once capable. 

Grade: Grade 1

Subject: Language (English)
Section: Grammar
Lesson: Sentence Building
